headline: PWV Outperforms the S&P 500 by 10 Points Thanks to Well-Timed Energy Bets
summary: Most investors looking at large-cap value ETFs face a simple question: Do I want broad, market-weight exposure or a more concentrated bet on specific sectors? The Invesco Large Cap Value ETF (NYSEARCA:PWV) answers that by leaning heavily into financials and energy, making it less of a core holding and more of a tactical position for ... PWV Outperforms the S&P 500 by 10 Points Thanks to Well-Timed Energy Bets
